raw_text:
The HGS consists of the Pilot Display Unit (PDU) and the Power Supply Unit (PSU). This section discusses proper operation of the PDU glass display panel, also known as the combiner. Refer to ﬁgure on page 4-23 for description of the brightness controls located on the PDU.

Figure 9-1 Pilot Display Unit

5th Edition 02 APR 19 9-1
